eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: SpriteMasking
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Use a sprite or a shape painter to mask another object.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: When masked, the masked object is only visible through the mask.

eventsFunctions.description: Define a shape painter as a mask of an object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Mask an object with a shape painter
eventsFunctions.name: MaskWithShapePainter

parameters.description: Shape painter to use as a mask
parameters.name: Mask

eventsFunctions.description: Define a sprite as a mask of an object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Mask an object with a sprite
eventsFunctions.name: Mask

parameters.description: Sprite object to use as a mask
parameters.name: Mask

eventsFunctions.description: Remove the mask of the specified object.
eventsFunctions.name: Unmask

parameters.description: Object with a mask to remove
parameters.name: Masked

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @Bouh, D8H
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ExtendedVariables
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Add conditions, actions and expressions to check for the existence of a variable, copy variables, delete existing ones from memory, and create dynamic variables.
description: - Conditions to check if a global/scene/object variable exists.
- Actions to copy object variables, global and scene variables.
- Actions to delete an existing global/scene variable from memory.
- Actions to create a global/scene variable using a text expression, rather than a variable name input.
- Expressions to get the value or text from a global/scene variable using a text expression, rather than a variable name.
Text expressions allows to enter the name of the variable with an expression like `"MyVar"+ ToString(Variable(Health))`

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a global variable exists.
eventsFunctions.name: C_global_variable_exist

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the global variable exists.
eventsFunctions.name: GlobalVariableExist

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a scene variable exists.
eventsFunctions.name: C_scene_variable_exist

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the scene variable exists.
eventsFunctions.name: SceneVariableExist

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an object variable exists.
eventsFunctions.name: C_object_variable_exist

eventsFunctions.description: Check if an object variable exists.
eventsFunctions.name: ObjectVariableExist

inlineCode: // If any object does NOT have the variable, return false.

eventsFunctions.description: Copy an object variable from one object to another.
eventsFunctions.name: A_CopyObjectVariable
eventsFunctions.sentence: Copy the variable _PARAM1_ of _PARAM2_ to the variable _PARAM3_ of _PARAM4_

parameters.longDescription: To copy the variable between 2 instances of the same object, the variable has to be copied to another object first.
parameters.name: TargetObject

eventsFunctions.description: Copy the object variable from one object to another.
eventsFunctions.name: CopyObjectVariable
eventsFunctions.sentence: Copy the variable _PARAM2_ of _PARAM1_ to the variable _PARAM4_ of _PARAM3_ (clear destination first: _PARAM5_)

parameters.longDescription: To copy the variable between 2 instances of the same object, the variable has to be copied to another object first.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: JSONResourceLoader
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Loads a JSON resource into a variable.
description: Loads a (static) JSON resource from your project files into a global, scene, or object variable.
NEVER use this to load your game.json into a variable - this would increase your game size by a lot and make your whole project file available for anyone to open!

eventsFunctions.description: Loads a JSON resource into a scene structure variable.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load a JSON resource in a scene variable
eventsFunctions.name: LoadJSONToScene

parameters.description: The resource to load the JSON from
parameters.name: Resource

parameters.description: The scene variable to load the JSON to
parameters.name: Variable

eventsFunctions.description: Loads a JSON resource into a global structure variable.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load a JSON resource in a global variable
eventsFunctions.name: LoadJSONToGlobal

parameters.description: The resource to load the JSON from
parameters.name: Resource

parameters.description: The global variable to load the JSON to
parameters.name: Variable

eventsFunctions.description: Loads a JSON resource into an object structure variable.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load a JSON resource in an object variable

parameters.description: The resource to load the JSON from
parameters.name: Resource

parameters.name: Object

parameters.name: Variable
